name: Cellar
rules: +1 Action, Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

name: Chapel
rules: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

name: Moat
rules: +2 Cards, When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

name: Chancellor
rules: +2 Coins, You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

name: Village
rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions.

name: Woodcutter
rules: +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

name: Workshop
rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Bureaucrat
rules: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

name: Feast
rules: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Gardens
rules: Variable, Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Militia
rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

name: Moneylender
rules: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.

name: Remodel
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Smithy
rules: +3 Cards.

name: Thief
rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

name: Throne Room
rules: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

name: Council Room
rules: +4 Cards, +1 Buy, Each other player draws a card.

name: Festival
rules: +2 Actions, +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

name: Laboratory
rules: +2 Cards, +1 Action.

name: Library
rules: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

name: Market
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin.

name: Mine
rules: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

name: Witch
rules: +2 Cards, Each other player gains a Curse card.

name: Adventurer
rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

name: Courtyard
rules: +3 Card, Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Pawn
rules: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

name: Secret Chamber
rules: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Great Hall
rules: 1 Victory, +1 Card, +1 Action.

name: Shanty Town
rules: +2 Actions, Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

name: Steward
rules: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

name: Swindler
rules: +2 Coins, Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

name: Wishing Well
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

name: Baron
rules: +1 Buy, You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

name: Bridge
rules: +1 Buy, +1 Coin. All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Conspirator
rules: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

name: Coppersmith
rules: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

name: Ironworks
rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an... Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

name: Mining Village
rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

name: Scout
rules: +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: Duke
rules: Worth 1 Victory per Duchy you have.

name: Minion
rules: +1 Action, Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

name: Saboteur
rules: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

name: Torturer
rules: +3 Card, Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

name: Trading Post
rules: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

name: Tribute
rules: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an... Action Card, +2 Actions; Treasure Card, +2 Coins; Victory Card, +2 Cards.

name: Upgrade
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

name: Harem
rules: 2 Coins, 2 Victory.

name: Nobles
rules: 2 Victory, Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.

name: Embargo
rules: +2 Coins, Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. - When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

name: Haven
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

name: Lighthouse
rules: +1 Action, Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. - While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

name: Pearl Diver
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

name: Ambassador
rules: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Fishing Village
rules: +2 Actions, +1 Coin, At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

name: Lookout
rules: +1 Action, Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

name: Smugglers
rules: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

name: Warehouse
rules: +3 Card, +1 Action, Discard 3 cards.

name: Cutpurse
rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

name: Navigator
rules: +2 Coins, Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Pirate Ship
rules: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

name: Salvager
rules: +1 Buy, Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

name: Sea Hag
rules: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

name: Treasure Map
rules: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Bazaar
rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.

name: Explorer
rules: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

name: Ghost Ship
rules: +2 Card, Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

name: Merchant Ship
rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

name: Outpost
rules: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

name: Tactician
rules: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

name: Treasury
rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coin, When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Wharf
rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.

name: Vineyard
rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Potion
rules: Worth 1 Potion.

name: Monument
rules: +2 Coins; +1 <VP>

name: Counting House
rules: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

name: Expand
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Forge
rules: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in Coins of the trashed cards.

name: King's Court
rules: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

name: Platinum
rules: 5 Coins.

name: Remake
rules: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

name: Harvest
rules: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

name: Fairgrounds
rules: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down)

name: Develop
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Silk Road
rules: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

name: Stables
rules: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

name: Abandoned Mine
rules: +1 Coin

name: Ruined Library
rules: +1 Card

name: Ruined Market
rules: +1 Buy

name: Ruined Village
rules: +1 Action

name: Survivors
rules: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

name: Hovel
rules: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

name: Necropolis
rules: +2 Actions

name: Armory
rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Marauder
rules: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

name: Procession
rules: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

name: Graverobber
rules: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

name: Altar
rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Taxman
rules: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Butcher
rules: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

name: Journeyman
rules: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Soothsayer
rules: Gain a gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.

name: Amulet
rules: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +1 Coin; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

name: Miser
rules: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +1 Coin per Copper on your Tavern mat.

name: Giant
rules: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +1 Coin. If it's face up, +5 Coins, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

name: Alms
rules: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Quest
rules: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Bonfire
rules: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

name: Expedition
rules: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

name: Ferry
rules: Move your -2 Coins cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost 2 Coins less on your turns, but  not less than 0 Coins).

name: Plan
rules: Move your Trashing token to an Action supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

name: Mission
rules: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.

name: Pilgrimage
rules: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

name: Ball
rules: Take your -1 Coin token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to 4 Coins.

name: Raid
rules: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

name: Seaway
rules: Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).

name: Trade
rules: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.

name: Lost Arts
rules: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).

name: Training
rules: Move your +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Coin).

name: Inheritance
rules: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to 4 Coins. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).

name: Pathfinding
rules: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).

name: Envoy
rules: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

name: Stash
rules: Worth 2 Coins. When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.

name: Prince
rules: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to 4 coins. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)

name: Copper
rules: 1 Coin

name: Curse
rules: -1 Victory

name: Estate
rules: 1 Victory

name: Silver
rules: 2 Coins

name: Potion
rules: 1 Potion

name: Duchy
rules: 3 Victory

name: Gold
rules: 3 Coins

name: Province
rules: 6 Victory

name: Platinum
rules: 5 Coins

name: Colony
rules: 10 Victory

name: Copper
rules: 1 Coin.

name: Curse
rules: -1 Victory.

name: Estate
rules: 1 Victory.

name: Silver
rules: 2 Coins.

name: Duchy
rules: 3 Victory.

name: Gold
rules: 3 Coins.

name: Province
rules: 6 Victory.
